Package com.eventmaster.backend.services

Class EventService

java.lang.Object
com.eventmaster.backend.services.EventService
@Service public class EventService extends Object
A class which receives and processes the requests of the controller concerning the management of events.
Author:
Fabian Eilber, Fabian Unger
